articles.description: Google’s AI mining-by-default proposal to the Australian government comes a month after the company declared it would scrape all the internet's data.
articles.content: Google hungers for all that content produced by the wealth of digital publishers creating text, video, and images on a daily basis. To deal with the sticky copyright issues at the heart of AI trainin… [+3524 chars]

articles.author: Jason Rainbow
articles.title: Vyoma orders pilot satellites for debris-monitoring constellation - SpaceNews
articles.description: German startup Vyoma has ordered two pilot satellites for its proposed space debris-monitoring constellation from EnduroSat, the eight-year-old Bulgarian cubesat specialist.
articles.content:
TAMPA, Fla. German startup Vyoma has ordered two pilot satellites for its proposed space debris-monitoring constellation from EnduroSat, the eight-year-old Bulgarian cubesat specialist.
